CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests debugger does not fail when stopped while a panel other than scripts was opened. Both valid and invalid expressions are added to watch expressions.

Watches before running testFunction:
x: <not available>
y.foo: <not available>
Watches on pause in testFunction:
x: 4
y.foo: <not available>
